text.section:
This subtitle does not preclude an appointing authority and an employee from agreeing to the:
holding in abeyance of a disciplinary action for a period not to exceed 18 months in order to permit an employee to improve conduct or performance; or
imposition of a lesser disciplinary action as a final and binding action, not subject to any further review.

section.section: If an employee fails to appeal a decision in accordance with this subtitle, the employee is considered to have accepted the decision.
A failure to decide an appeal in accordance with this subtitle is considered a denial from which an appeal may be made.

text.section: The parties may agree to waive or extend any time stated in this subtitle.
Each party shall make every effort to resolve an appeal at the lowest level possible.
